description:
2030


A super action TPS SURVIVAL sci-fi ONLINE Multiplayer Battleroyale/coop game.
- Play with friends in multiplayer trought steam subsystem, host game with 4 players

It's 2030 AC, Beings from planet Venus are back from a long journey around the universe. In the past they planted us on earth, now are back and see what we did to our planet and their species. They declare WAR to humans. Have invaded the human colonies on Moon, unleashing a deadly virus trough misterious high tech machine whit a long range beam that teletransport dead people everywhere with thirst of living flesh.. Use military weapons with autocombust ammo, make body parts fly (very satisfying), clear the area from deadly hordes, 3 maps to play multiplayer or solo: JunkYard, Secret Base and Moon Colony.
Be the server and drive on the moon surface with your friends on the top shooting all the place, destroy the big worm and the alien machine, more & more unique multiplayer fun!




Its 2300 AC, since biblical times, Man has witnessed and recorded strange manifestations in the sky and speculated on the possibilities of visitors from another world, because of scientific advances, it is now possible to realise an ancient dream - the exploration of outer space.

Beings from planet Venus are back from a long journey around the cosmic system. A long time ago they created us, we never know until today, now they are back and see what we did to the earth, so they declare war to humans. Have invaded our planet and unleash a deadly virus that make dead people come to life with thirst of living flesh. Using a high tech machine planted on the first moon base made it by humas, they teletransport living corpses all around to erradicate us, the human beings only.

The whole world is under attack, all military installations are to fire on sight. Humans wondered whether their scientific know-how and their best weapons would be effective in any battle versus "hard to kill" zombies. They develop a special ammo from high military weapons that auto combust flesh and copied some of the venussians technology to make a device that teletransport weapons and ammo (you must earn points shooting living corpses to use it and open secret doors) drive a car on the moon surface to reach the main boss that feeds the machine.

Humans was trying to colonize the MOON and other rock planets with ultimate hidden knowledge, dome technology with big machines that with condensation produce rain and air, (separating the oxigen / hidrogen from the condensed water in a special glas), but Vennusians has make and deployed an strange device that make and teletransport deads.. an ultimate military team needs you to clean the area, there are no soldiers left more than you and your friends.

Play alone against the hordes, survive and try different set of modern military weapons, use high tech traps to make mountains of bodies. Dismember and autocombust bodyparts, enjoy the original music and unique story.

If you like zombie games, amazing real military weapons, body dismember, futuristic sci fi maps, fire action and blood, and get fun with friends, this is a MUST on your steam library.

Full settings menu



  • CLEAR THE PLACES FROM THE HORDES AND EARN POINTS TO BUY WEAPONS AMMO AND OPEN DOORS
  • CHOOSE BETWEEN 8 CHARACTERS AND 3 MAPS WITH DIFFERENT WEAPONS AND LOOKS
  • MULTIPLAYER SYSTEM (HOST GAME FIND GAME, PLAY WITH FRIENDS) 4 PLAYERS WITH FRIENDLY FIRE AND RESCUE MODE
  • PRESS TAB TO SEE MULTIPLAYER STATS (KILLS DEADS AND POINTS)
  • REALISTIC MILITARY WEAPONS AND FX
  • "UNLEASH HELL" POWER ON THE VENUSIANS MACHINE AND SURVIVE THE HORDES
  • HIGH QUALITY GRAPHICS
  • MENU GRAPHICS AND CONTROL SETTINGS
  • DISMEMBER BODIES, SET THEM IN FIRE!
  • DRIVE CARS (PRESS "Q" ONLY SERVER PLAYER) AND CALL YOUR FRIENDS TO SHOOT ON THE TOP OF IT WHILE DRIVING (MAP 3)
  • TRAPS and more


]ARE YOU READY TO COMBAT?
